#Load packages
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

#Load data
```{r}
df <- read_excel("../data/MB5370_plot_deconstruction.xlsx")
```

#Generate ggplot w/ facet wraps separating groups and change color palette to colorblind friendly
```{r}
#make sure individuals and groups are distinct colors
df$Group_Individual <- paste(df$Group, df$Individual, sep = "_")

det_plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = Hour, y = Percent_detection, color = Group_Individual, group = Individual)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~Group, ncol = 1)+
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2")+
  labs(
    x = "Hour",
    y = expression("% Detections of " * italic("U. asperrimus") * " in the lagoon")
  )+
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("Plot deconstruction.png", plot = det_plot, width = 8, height = 6)

print(det_plot)
```
